{"id":941705381,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 1 day","timestamp":1682790712,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/941705381/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String to Integer (atoi)","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n\n    long long myatoi(string str, int n){\n        if(n == 1) return str[0]-'0';\n\n        return 10*myatoi(str, n-1)+str[n-1]-'0';\n    }\n\n    int myAtoi(string s) {\n        int n = s.length()-1;\n        while(isalpha(s[n]) || s[n] == ' ') n--;\n\n        int i=0;\n        while(s[i] == ' ') i++;\n\n        for(int j=i;j<n;j++){\n            if((s[j] == '+' || s[j]=='-') && j>i) return 0;\n            if(s[j] == '.' && j==0) return 0;\n            if(s[j] == '.'){\n                n = j-1;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n\n        if(isalpha(s[i])) return 0;\n        if(s[i] == '-'){\n            long long num = -1*myatoi(s.substr(i+1, n-i), n-i); \n            return (num < INT_MIN)?INT_MIN:(int)num;;\n        }\n        else{\n            long long num = myatoi(s.substr(i, n-i+1), n-i+1);\n            return (num > INT_MAX)?INT_MAX:(int)num;\n        }\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-to-integer-atoi","has_notes":false}
